prompt.content: Using the Basic-Fit N.V. Annual Report for FY 2024, calculate the Underlying Price-to-Earnings (P/E) Ratio using the year-end 2024 share price. Round the final ratio to 2 decimal places.

rubrics.name: Uses share price at year-end 2024 = €22.58 as an input

messages.content: Uses share price at year-end 2024 = €22.58 as an input

rubrics.name: Uses the Diluted underlying net result per share = €0.65 as an input

messages.content: Uses the Diluted underlying net result per share = €0.65 as an input

rubrics.name: Calculates final Underlying Price-to-Earnings Ratio for FY 2024 = 34.74, rounded to exactly two decimal places

messages.content: Calculates final Underlying Price-to-Earnings Ratio for FY 2024 = 34.74, rounded to exactly two decimal places
